Second_Activity
syu1
Home
Dashboard
Notifications
-Are you here Miss Luna?!? I have been searching for you everywhere.
Hello blank fragment
Do not scare me like that. From now, please tell me when you go somewhere.
-O, Gion, why are you so worried?
Nothing bad will happen to me, and if I forget about my rainy garden...
It is scary to imagine that everything can happen again.I will not let another death of my close person.
-Please, do not torture yourself!
-Ok, I will try... When did my sister Elion visit us?
-Last Saturday. Did something happen Miss Luna?
-Arrange a meeting for us!
-No, I just thought that it would be nice to meet her.(+100 coins)
-If yes, it\'s not your deal. Don\'t stick your nose where they don\'t ask! (0 coins)
-I will immediately do that, Miss.
-No, I just thought that it would be nice to meet her.
-If yes, it\'s not your deal. Don\'t stick your nose where they don\'t ask!
-And also my rainy garden needs a special care, and I will be grateful for your help.
Gion bowed with gratitude and went to arrange a the sisters meeting . Time passed, but Luna remained thoughtful in the garden, thinking about the past and the future.
Elion\'s and Luna\'s meeting happened in cozy edge of the cerulean garden. The scent of flowers and sound of drops were making an atmosphere of incredible harmony.
-My dears, how wonderful is to meet you again. Dear Gion, does not my sister putting a lot of work on you?
-No no, what are you saying Miss Elion. Miss Luna is very kind to me.
-Gion, thank you for arranging meeting with my sister, but for now let us alone. And say others not to come here.
-Whatever you say Miss. Have a nice time.
-Sister, did anything happen? What is this secrecy? Have you learned anything about Sylphia?
-Not about her... On Friday evening, when I as always were taking care of rainy flowers, I found a phone.
-And what\'s inside?
-Unfortunately, I don\'t know, there is a password with eight symbols.
-How can I help you, sister?
-I am not sure but on the lock screen there is one very interesting picture.
-Keep silent. ( Nothing happened with coins)
-Miss, I think that you were not guilty of your brother\'s death. (+50 coins)
-I will send people to check that is the phone on its place.
-No, Luna, I will check it by myself. If you will sent people it will be suspicious for Sylphia and Faera. Let me do that by myself.
-Ok, I trust you.
-Miss, I think that you weren\'t guilty of your brother\'s death.
Keep silent.
